sketches.name: Moksha
sketches.quote: Seeing this is a kind of meditation. More you see, more you get addicted.

sketches.name: Feel The Life
sketches.quote: How you draw is a reflection of how you feel about the world. You're not capturing it, you're interpreting it.

sketches.name: The Dark Saint
sketches.quote: The ability to draw depends on one's ability to see the way an artist sees.

sketches.name: Life at Risk
sketches.quote: Drawing is the artist's most direct and spontaneous expression. A species of writing: it reveals, better than does painting, his true personality.

sketches.name: The Moon & The Romance
sketches.quote: The painter draws with his eyes, not with his hands.

sketches.name: You're Mine
sketches.quote: It gives me such a sense of peace to draw; more than prayer, walks, anything.

sketches.name: Wired Smile
sketches.quote: Originality depends only on the character of the drawing and the vision peculiar to each artist.

sketches.name: The Stranger
sketches.quote: I love the quality of pencil. It helps me to get to the core of a thing.

sketches.name: The Unconditional Lover
sketches.quote: Photography is an immediate reaction, drawing is a meditation.

sketches.name: The Pain
sketches.quote: Learning to draw is really a matter of learning to see - to see correctly.

sketches.name: The Rainbow
sketches.quote: I have learned that what I have not drawn, I have never really seen, and that when I start drawing an ordinary thing, I realize how extraordinary it is, sheer miracle.

sketches.name: The Romance
sketches.quote: Drawing is not what one sees but what one can make others see

sketches.name: A Girl & The Jungle
sketches.quote: One must always draw, draw with the eyes, when one cannot draw with a pencil.

sketches.name: Hayya
sketches.quote: Drawing takes time. A line has time in it.

sketches.name: Thirsty
sketches.quote: Inspiration exists, but it has to find you working.

sketches.name: The Dance
sketches.quote: Drawing is rather like playing chess: your mind races ahead of the moves that you eventually make.

sketches.name: Deep Eye
sketches.quote: An artist must have his measuring tools not in the hand, but in the eye.

sketches.name: Jocker
sketches.quote: At its essence, art is an alchemical process. Alchemy is a process of transformation.

sketches.name: The Kiss
sketches.quote: If people only knew how hard I work to gain my mastery. It wouldn't seem so wonderful at all.

sketches.name: Intimate
sketches.quote: A true artist is not one who is inspired, but one who inspires others.

sketches.name: Look
sketches.quote: Artists are just children who refuse to put down their crayons.

sketches.name: Inversion
sketches.quote: It is only when we are no longer fearful that we begin to create.

sketches.name: The Sideway
sketches.quote: If I create from the heart, nearly everything works; if from the head, almost nothing.

sketches.name: The Pose
sketches.quote: The aim of art is to represent not the outward appearance of things, but their inward significance.

sketches.name: The Prey
sketches.quote: Art washes away from the soul the dust of everyday life.

sketches.name: Eyes On Fire
sketches.quote: Drawing at its best is not what your eyes see but what our mind understands.

sketches.name: The Face
sketches.quote: Art is not a handicraft, it is the transmission of feeling the artist has experienced.

sketches.name: The Scream
sketches.quote: Learn the rules like a pro, so you can break them like an artist.

sketches.name: Scream Out Loud
sketches.quote: Art is longing. You never arrive, but you keep going in the hope that you will.

sketches.name: Shutup
sketches.quote: Where the spirit does not work with the hand, there is no art.

sketches.name: Think
sketches.quote: Paintings have a life of their own that derives from the painter's soul.
